titles.title: A resolution to modify certain provisions of Senate Resolution 356 relating to the John Heinz Senate Fellowship Program.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/1/1994--Introduced. Revises certain provisions for the John Heinz Senate Fellowship Program (which are contained in S. Res. 356, agreed to in the 102d Congress). Limits the period of employment for each participant to not more than one year. Makes funds available for a five-year period to the Secretary of the Senate to compensate eligible participants. Terminates such program five years from the date of adoption of this provision.
